metadata.title: CVE-2014-3956 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The sm_close_on_exec function in conf.c in sendmail before 8.14.9 hasarguments in the wrong order, and consequently skips setting expectedFD_CLOEXEC flags, which allows local users to access unintendedhigh-numbered file descriptors via a custom mail-delivery program.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmilter1.0.1 - 8.14.4-7
rmail - 8.14.4-7
sendmail - 8.14.4-7
sendmail-base - 8.14.4-7
sendmail-bin - 8.14.4-7
sendmail-cf - 8.14.4-7
sensible-mda - 8.14.4-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sendmail package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.14.4-7').
